/* eslint-disable template-curly-spacing */
 
import {css} from "emotion";
 
import {unitMath} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import flaggedStyles,{generateStyleFlags} from "../../../utils/flagged-styles";
// import {unitMath} from "../../utils/css-utils";
import getMenuVars from "../menu/menu.var";
import menuItemStyle from "../menu/menu-item.style";
 
 
export default styleMemoize(function(flags = [],variation) {
 
  const menuVars = getMenuVars();
 
  const {
    lineHeight,
    hoverItemBackground,
    listviewItemVerticalPadding,
    listviewItemHorizontalPadding,
  } = menuVars;
 
  return flaggedStyles("listview-item", flags, {
    
    _: ()=>(css`
 
      ${menuItemStyle(generateStyleFlags(flags, ["vertical"]),variation)}
 
      &>* {
        width: 100%;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        align-items: center;
 
        >* {
          display: block;
          flex: 1 1 auto;
          padding: ${listviewItemVerticalPadding} ${unitMath(listviewItemHorizontalPadding,"/",2)};
          line-height: ${lineHeight};
 
          &:first-child {
            padding-left: ${listviewItemHorizontalPadding};
          }
          &:last-child {
            padding-right: ${listviewItemHorizontalPadding};
          }
        }
 
        h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p {
          margin:0;
          line-height:${lineHeight};
          &.small {
            font-size:0.8em;
          }
          &.large {
            font-size:1.4em;
          }
        }
        h1 {
          line-height: ${unitMath(lineHeight,"*",(1 / 1.5))};
          margin-bottom: 0.1em;
        }
        h2 {
          line-height: ${unitMath(lineHeight,"*",(1 / 1.5))};
          margin-bottom:0.15em;
        }
        h3 {
          line-height:${unitMath(lineHeight,"*",(1.15 / 1.5))};
          margin-bottom:0.1em;
        }
        h4 {
          line-height:${unitMath(lineHeight,"*",(1.15 / 1.5))};
          margin-bottom:0.15em;
        }
        h5 {
          line-height:${unitMath(lineHeight,"*",(1.3 / 1.5))};
          margin-bottom:0.15em;
        }
      }
 
      &>a {
        &:hover {
          background: ${hoverItemBackground};
        }
        color: inherit;
      }
 
    `),
    // stackLabels: ()=>(css`
    //   &>* {
    //     flex-direction: column;
    //     align-items: flex-start;
    //     padding: ${listviewItemVerticalPadding} ${listviewItemHorizontalPadding};
    //     &>*,&>*:first-child {
    //       padding: 0;
    //       max-width: none;
    //     }
    //     &>*:first-child {
    //       padding-bottom: ${listviewItemVerticalPadding};
    //     }
    //   }
    // `),
  });
});
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 04 2019 18:54:39 GMT+0000 (GMT)
